original_text: So after he returned the silver to his mother, she took two hundred shekels of silver and gave them to a silversmith, who used them to make the idol. And it was put in Micah’s house.
korean_text: 미가가 그 은을 그의 어머니에게 도로 주었으므로 어머니가 그 은 이백을 가져다 은장색에게 주어 한 신상을 새기고 한 신상을 부어 만들었더니 그 신상이 미가의 집에 있더라

sentences.original_text: So after he returned the silver to his mother
she took two hundred shekels of silver
and gave them to a silversmith
who used them to make the idol
And it was put in Micah's house
